channel.title: Plase help
channel.description:
ok i have 2 questions.
1. how can i run my server when my comp is off ??
have vos from vpsland.com
2. how can i make my download link with client smaller ??
cause my client is 56 mb.
how can i make it smaller without ruining it ?
ause i tryed with only run.bat and gui. but it said something misssing gui or sumthing :S
plaese help :S
